author: George Kappeler
description: Herbal with hints of apple, mint and eucalyptus. This classic is also often made with green Chartreuse but we prefer as per classic recipes with half Yellow Chartreuse and half Bénédictine.
name: Widow's Kiss
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR (or shake) all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
